name: Void Terrors: Cho'Gath & Kog'Maw
author: Gemini
description: A high-durability vanguard paired with a glass-cannon artillery piece. Cho'Gath grows as the game progresses while Kog'Maw melts targets from afar.

cards.name: Feast
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to an adjacent enemy; if this defeats them, Cho'Gath heals 4 HP.

cards.name: Rupture
cards.rulesText: Deal 1 damage to all enemies in a 2-hex line; those hit are Stunned.

cards.name: Feral Scream
cards.rulesText: Deal 1 damage to all adjacent enemies and they are Silenced.

cards.name: Vorpal Spikes
cards.rulesText: Cho'Gath’s next attack this turn deals +2 damage.

cards.name: Stoneplate
cards.rulesText: Gain Armor and a 2-point shield that absorbs the next damage taken.

cards.name: Void Carapace
cards.rulesText: Heal Cho'Gath for 4 HP and gain Fortified.

cards.name: Feast of Worlds
cards.rulesText: Deal 5 damage to an adjacent enemy; Cho'Gath gains +1 to all future Defense values (max +3).

cards.name: Living Artillery
cards.rulesText: Deal 3 damage to an enemy up to 5 squares away.

cards.name: Caustic Spittle
cards.rulesText: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent enemy and they become Vulnerable.

cards.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
cards.rulesText: Kog'Maw’s ranged attacks this turn have +2 range and +1 damage.

cards.name: Void Ooze
cards.rulesText: Push an adjacent enemy 3 squares and they become Immobilized.

cards.name: Icathian Surprise
cards.rulesText: Play only when Kog'Maw is defeated: deal 4 damage to all enemies within 2 squares.

cards.name: Caustic Trail
cards.rulesText: Kog'Maw moves up to 3 squares and may move through enemy figures.

cards.name: Void Infestation
cards.rulesText: Cho'Gath and Kog'Maw may each move up to 2 squares; Cho'Gath may Push any adjacent enemies 1 square.
